description.@en: Herr Sunna once said, “...in the midst of chaos, there is also opportunity”. You will implore your comrades to find an opening when mayhem rises.

effect.@en: Whenever you succeed at using Inspiring Words, allies may immediately make an Opportunity Attack. In addition, whenever you succeed at using Litany of Hatred, enemies affected by it cannot Counterspell, Dodge or Parry the next Attack Action your allies make.
